Title: Metti, una sera a cena
Writer: Giuseppe Patroni Griffi (play), Dario Argento (screenplay), Giuseppe Patroni Griffi (screenplay), Carlo Carunchio (screenplay collaboration)
Actors: Jean-Louis Trintignant, Lino Capolicchio, Tony Musante, Florinda Bolkan
Plot: A liberal-thinking author watches his wife as she attempts to seduce his best friend at a dinner party.
